modify_description: Changed step 30's ask_llm tool_response from null to a RuntimeException indicating LLM service connection failure
Updated step 31's output to use the previously deduced difference of 22 instead of the correct LLM-provided 21, as the tool call failed
causality_chain: Tool Execution Exception@step30 -> ask_llm tool fails to return valid data -> ck_end_agent falls back to incorrectly deduced value -> wrong final answer
